title: Credit scores and the bias behind them
itunes:title: Credit scores and the bias behind them
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description:
In the third installment of our series “The Score,” we look at the bias that can be embedded in the credit-score algorithms that shape our financial lives.

Your donation powers the journalism you rely on. Give today to support Marketplace Tech.
